hero.title: Stop guessing. Find the supplements your body truly needs.
hero.subtitle: Through a 5-minute lifestyle questionnaire, we analyze your sleep, stress, and dietary habits. We create science-based nutrition recommendations tailored for you, not just selling the most expensive products.

badges.newSystem: New AI Nutrition Analysis System Launched

features.sectionSubtitle: This is not a typical quiz, but a screening system designed based on functional medicine logic.

smartAnalysis.title: Smart Logic Analysis
smartAnalysis.description: The system dynamically adjusts follow-up questions based on your initial answers. If you sleep well, we won't waste time asking about insomnia details.

priorityRanking.title: Precise Priority Ranking
priorityRanking.description: Not all deficiencies need supplementation. We categorize results into 'High Priority' and 'Moderate Recommendation' to help you spend wisely.

transparency.title: Transparent Ingredient History
transparency.description: Every recommended product clearly indicates its source, dosage, and related research, so you know exactly what you're putting into your body.

cta.sectionSubtitle: The entire process takes about 2-3 minutes. All data is used only for analysis and will not be shared.

auth.welcomeBack: Welcome back, please enter your credentials

otp.title: Enter Verification Code
otp.subtitle: Verification code sent to {contact}
otp.label: Verification Code
otp.hint: Please enter the 6-digit code sent to {contact}

consent.title: Terms of Use
consent.subtitle: Please read and agree to the following terms
consent.healthDataText: We will collect your questionnaire responses and health-related information to generate personalized nutrition recommendations. Your data will be encrypted and stored securely, used only for service provision, and will not be shared with third parties.
consent.disclaimerText: The recommendations provided by this platform are for reference only and do not constitute medical advice. Please consult a healthcare professional before starting any supplement regimen.
consent.healthConsentLabel: I have read and agree to the Health Data Usage Terms (Required)
consent.marketingConsentLabel: I agree to receive nutrition and health-related information and offers (Optional)
consent.mustAgree: You must agree to the Health Data Usage Terms to continue

footer.loginAgree: By logging in, you agree to our
footer.termsAndPrivacy: I have read and agree to the

errors.invalid_otp: Invalid verification code, please try again
errors.otp_expired: Verification code has expired, please request a new one
errors.rate_limit: Too many requests, please try again later
errors.internal_error: System error, please try again later
errors.send_failed: Failed to send verification code, please try again later
errors.verify_failed: Verification failed, please check the code

quiz.title: Health Questionnaire
quiz.analyzing: AI is analyzing your health data...
quiz.pleaseWait: AI is integrating your lifestyle questionnaire and report data to find the most important nutritional priorities for you.

upload.title: Final Step
upload.subtitle: Upload your report for more accurate analysis, or start calculation directly.
upload.uploadSubtitle: We will use AI to identify your values and provide more accurate recommendations. Supports PDF, JPG, PNG (Max 50MB).
upload.dragDrop: Drag and drop files here, or
upload.mobilePhoto: You can also use your phone to take photos and upload
upload.description: We will use AI to identify your values and provide more accurate recommendations. Supports PDF, JPG, PNG (Max 50MB).

usage.dailyLimit: Daily AI analysis limit reached ({limit} times/day)

results.title: Your Personalized Recommendations
results.disclaimer: [Health Disclaimer] This assessment is based on your self-reported lifestyle and symptom information and is for reference only. Any health advice cannot replace professional medical advice. If you have any health concerns, please consult a healthcare professional.
results.noRecommendations: Assessment Result: No obvious priority supplements needed at this time
results.aiGenerated: AI has analyzed and recommended the most suitable nutrition supplement plan for you
results.localCalculated: Below are the priority supplement items based on your answers (up to 3 items)
results.aiReasons: AI Analysis - Why this supplement is recommended:
results.noProducts: No products available in this category yet, stay tuned.
results.usageLimit: You have reached your daily AI analysis limit ({limit} times/day)
results.noRecommendationsTitle: Focus on Diet and Lifestyle for Now
results.noRecommendationsText: Based on your questionnaire responses, no supplement line stands out as requiring 'priority supplementation' at this time. This usually means you can focus on balanced diet, regular routine, and exercise first, then adjust as needed.
results.focusOnLifestyle: Focus on Diet and Lifestyle for Now
results.noRecommendationsDetail: Based on your questionnaire responses, no supplement line stands out as requiring 'priority supplementation' at this time. This usually means you can focus on balanced diet, regular routine, and exercise first, then adjust as needed.

empty.title: No favorite products yet
empty.description: Click the heart button in recommendation results to save products
empty.subtitle: Click the heart button in recommendation results to save products

empty.title: No assessment history yet
empty.description: After completing the questionnaire, your recommendation results will be automatically saved here
empty.subtitle: After completing the questionnaire, your recommendation results will be automatically saved here
